summary.overall_findings: Based on 7 publicly available sources, PPG Industries' published materials address 3 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. These pillars include transparency, oversight, and governance, with documented policy-level evidence. For transparency, company help pages describe AI capabilities and customer-facing tools, explaining what AI enables for customers. Additionally, an interview describes the importance of human escalation for AI agents, which is also documented under oversight. No qualifying public evidence was found for fairness, explainability, and 2 additional pillars.
